intent_atoms.description: Child boxes must not exceed parent ranges and overlapping payloads are disallowed.
Export schema standardization to provide canonical export recommendations.
Comparative schema analysis completed, canonical export recommendations documented, and verification plan verified.

functional_units.name: Parent Containment and Non-Overlap Enforcement
functional_units.description: Validates that child boxes are within parent ranges and flags overlapping payloads for CLI/UI surfaces.

functional_units.name: Schema Export Standardization
functional_units.description: Provides canonical export recommendations and verification plan for schema exports.
